mapper.select: SELECT M_NO, M_NAME, M_DIRECTOR, M_RUNNING_TIME, M_ACTOR, M_OPEN FROM MOVIE
SELECT R.RESERV_NO, R.CUSTOMER_ID, R.SEAT_NO, S.SCHEDULE_DATE, S.START_TIME FROM RESERVATION R, SCHEDULE S WHERE R.SCHEDULE_NO = S.SCHEDULE_NO AND CUSTOMER_ID = 'solbee99'
SELECT SCHEDULE_NO, M_NO ,THEATER_NO, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME FROM SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MOVIE WHERE M_NO = #{m_no})
SELECT DISTINCT SCHEDULE_DATE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = #{m_no}
SELECT START_TIME FROM SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = #{m_no} AND SCHEDULE_DATE = #{schedule_date}
SELECT SEAT_PK, SEAT_NO, THEATER_NO, SEAT_ASS FROM SEAT WHERE THEATER_NO = (SELECT THEATER_NO FROM SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = #{m_no} AND SCHEDULE_DATE=#{schedule_date} AND START_TIME=#{start_time})
